headline: 3M and US Conec Collaborate on Expanded Beam Optical Interconnect Technology for Data Centers
summary: 3M and US Conec Ltd. today announced a strategic licensing agreement for 3M™ Expanded Beam Optical Interconnect technology, a solution to meet the performance and scalability needs of next-generation data centers and advanced network architectures. The collaboration combines advanced optical technology from 3M with US Conec's expertise in high-density connectivity systems, expanded beam optics, and precision manufacturing to help deliver innovative solutions tailored to the evolving demands of m

headline: Why Is 3M Company (MMM) Among the Best Dividend Stocks to Invest In?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Dogs of the Dow Dividend Stocks to Invest in.
